alert.note: Alert for Bottineau (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 31 at 5:53PM CDT until July 31 at 6:30PM CDT by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 630 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN BOTTINEAU COUNTY... At 553 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Souris, or 13 miles northwest of Bottineau, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Bottineau around 630 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Carbury and Roth. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
